record.description: "You’re the tops," say Jean Jacob, Edith Hansen, and Margaret Fairman, University of Chicago co-eds who picked Wilbur Jerger as one of the escorts for the twelve Hollywood beauties, arriving here today (Thursday) via American Airlines in advance of Warner Brothers new picture "Gold Diggers of 1937." The Hollywood beauties will also be met by Chicago’s challengers to their claims of beauty, twelve girls employed in State Street business houses and chosen by the State Street Council.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Caption attached.From the State Street Council. 209 South State Street. Press release Thursday, November 18, 1936.
